Method Detail

getAllAccounts

java.util.List getAllAccounts()
List all accounts.

Returns:
List of accounts sorted by account name

findAccountsByName

java.util.List findAccountsByName(java.lang.String name)
Find all accounts by name. We will only pass in one string and Let the method do the work of finding all possible matches

Parameters:
String - name - Name to search for
Returns:
List of accounts sorted by relevance to initial search

findAccountsByPhone

java.util.List findAccountsByPhone(java.lang.String phone)
Find all accounts by phone number. We will only pass in one string and Let the method do the work of finding all possible matches. Special Characters(dashes, parenthesis) are ignored

Parameters:
String - phone - phone number to search for
Returns:
List of accounts sorted by relevance to initial search

findAccountById

Account findAccountById(int id)
Find a specific account by Id

Parameters:
id - - Account id
Returns:
Account record with account_id = id. null if no account exists

Add an account

Parameters:
firstName - - Real first name
lastName - - Real last name
accountName - - The account name
Returns:
The account number generated for the new account

createAccount

Account createAccount(Account account)
Parameters:
account - - account record to add, NOTE: account id is genreated automatically!
Returns:
Account record if success. null if failed

Returns:
